snippet: In contrast with the previous gathering three years ago, when the global economic crisis was the focus, the changed agenda will focus on building prosperity.
abstract: Pres Obama will attend the Summit of the Americas in Cartagena, Colombia, where he will participate in discussions with Latin American leaders on trade, energy and drug trafficking; the agenda stands in stark contrast to a previous gathering in 2009, when the global economic crisis compelled leaders to focus on weathering the economic downturn.
lead_paragraph: In contrast with the previous gathering three years ago, when the global economic crisis was the focus, the changed agenda will focus on building prosperity.

headline.seo: Trade, Energy and Drugs Topics for Obama in Latin America
headline.main: Trade, Energy and Drugs Are Topics for Obama at Summit of the Americas
headline.print_headline: Trade, Energy and Drugs Are Topics for Obama at Summit of the Americas

keywords.value: American Federation of Labor-Congress of Industrial Organizations
